H0.text: five tools of security management to overcome computer crime. Authentication

H1.text: five tools of security management to overcome computer crime. Encryption

H2.text: five tools of security management to overcome computer crime. Firewalls

H3.text: five tools of security management to overcome computer crime. implementation

A4.text: 71% of companies surveyed used encryption for some of their data in transit

A5.text: Most applications of encryption protect information only at rest or in transit, leaving sensitive data in clear text and potentially vulnerable to improper disclosure during processing, such as by a cloud service
